title.rendered: Board of Education Meeting on July 25

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a meeting on July 25 at 7 p.m.    The meeting will be held at the MacFadden Administration Building. Watch the meeting through youtube.

6:30 p.m. – Public Hearing: Districtwide Safety Plan
7:00 p.m. – Regular Meeting

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
